def_en: Submission is a state in which people can no longer do what they want to do because they have been brought under the control of someone else.
The submission of a proposal, report, or other document is the act of formally sending it to someone, so that they can consider it or decide about it.

def_cn: 提交的建议(或报告等);呈递的文件
def_en: A submission is a proposal, report, or other document that is formally sent or presented to someone, so that they can consider or decide about it.
